testimonials.name: Alokesh Duttaroy
testimonials.text: ﻿A wonderful evening unfolded with some of greater-Boston’s fantastic group of Bengali writers, who gathered to share their creative thoughts together with a super-energetic audience.

testimonials.name: Kasturi SenBhunia
testimonials.text: ﻿It was an incredible experience celebrating the Bengali Parampara of Poush Parban through music and festivity! A heartfelt thanks to my amazing team members—Malay, Somnath.

testimonials.name: Soumitro Pal
testimonials.text: ﻿It is a pleasure to present some of my students of ‘Pal Academy’ at the Poush Utsav, 2025 organised by Dishari Boston. We are super

testimonials.name: Subhrajit Saha
testimonials.text: ﻿A wonderful time at Dishari Poush Utsav: Friends, Food, Adda, Music, Dance, Cultural Events: An Evening Well Spent.
